full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'BYUNG BZHI GTOR MA'I GDAMS PA NYAMS SU LEN TSUL NANG DU 'BRID BSDUS TZAM ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES DBYANG DANG 'BYUNG BZHI GTOR MA'I GDAMS PA NYAMS SU LEN TSUL GSAL BAR BSHAD PA NAM MKHA'I RNGA CHEN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, ^'JAM DBYANG GONG MA'I BKA' LUNG GIS CHING SU TZUG THU NO MONG HANG DU 'BOD PA'I BAN CHUNG GYI NA PA SU MA TI AA BHYA SH'A SA NA SYA DHVA DZA ZHES BYA PAS, ^SNANG BA MTHA' YAS PAN CHEN @005B THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN DPAL BZANG PO'I CHOG BSGRAGS GZHIR BZHAG SENG CHEN SPRUL PA'I SPRU RIN PO CHE DANG BZHAD DNGUL CHU BLA MA CHOS BZANG PA'I BSHAD KHRID KYI YIG CHA DANG BRIS PA', ,)
